comments.text:

Obviously some aspects of skating are like dancing, especially for ice

comments.author: Katie Sky

comments.text:
That's actually not true at all. Many figure skaters do ballet and such to 
work on their grace and agility, but it's not like they have been doing it 
all their lives, just some classes to do off ice. I'm a figure skater, and 
I don't take ballet or any dance classes. Figure skating is a completely 
different sport than dancing, for the most part.
comments.author: Katie Sky

top_comment.text:
I've always thought that it's not fair for ice skaters to be on DWTS, 
because honestly... their profession has closer ties to dancing then say... 
i don't know, singing? Plus, isn't the discipline they are in called "Ice 
Dancing"? Either way, I' do love these two. (Forgive me if I'm wrong... I 
know close to nothing about ice skating) ﻿

comments.author: Pearl Tran

captions.text:
- OUR NEXT GUESTS
ARE COMPETING AGAINST EACH OTHER

ON THE NEW SEASON OF
"DANCING WITH THE STARS,"

BUT LAST MONTH
THEY MADE HISTORY

BY WINNING THE UNITED STATES'
FIRST EVER GOLD MEDAL
IN OLYMPIC ICE DANCING.
TAKE A LOOK.
[cheers and applause]

PLEASE WELCOME
OLYMPIC GOLD MEDALISTS
MERYL DAVIS AND CHARLIE WHITE.

WELL, HELLO, YOU TWO.
- HELLO.

- HOW'S IT FEEL--
HAS IT SUNK IN YET

THAT YOU'RE OLYMPIC
GOLD MEDALISTS?
- YOU KNOW, NOT REALLY.

IT'S BEEN A CRAZY
COUPLE OF WEEKS SINCE WE WON,
AND WE GOT HOME AND--
YOU KNOW, WE WENT TO THE RINK--

WE'RE GONNA BE TRAINING FOR A
TOUR, "STARS ON ICE," COMING UP,

AND WE NEEDED TO COME UP WITH
OUR PROGRAMS.

AND I'M DRIVING TO THE RINK,
AND IT'S JUST, LIKE,

HITTING ME
THAT THE LAST TIME I WAS HERE

I WAS SO NERVOUS, GETTING
PREPARED FOR THE OLYMPICS,
AND READY TO MAKE IT COUNT,

AND NOW I ACHIEVED THAT GOAL,
AND IT'S JUST--

IT'S CRAZY.
IT REALLY IS.

- YOU'RE DRIVING
ON THE OTHER SIDE OF IT NOW
WITH A GOLD MEDAL.
- THAT'S RIGHT, YEAH.

- AND NOT ONLY DID YOU MEDAL,
YOU GOLD MEDALED.

- THAT'S RIGHT.
- THAT'S INCREDIBLE.

AND SO YOU'VE BEEN SKATING
TOGETHER FOR 17 YEARS.

- YEAH.
- NOBODY ELSE?

IT'S JUST BEEN YOU TWO
FOR 17 YEARS.

- JUST THE TWO OF US.
- HOW DID Y'ALL FIND EACH OTHER,

AND HOW DID YOU
START DOING THIS?

- WELL, WE ACTUALLY GREW UP DOWN
THE STREET FROM ONE ANOTHER,

BELIEVE IT OR NOT,
AND WE'RE JUST--

- I DO.
- WELL, GOOD.

BUT, YEAH, AND SO WE STARTED
SKATING TOGETHER

WHEN WE WERE EIGHT AND NINE,
AND WE FIT REALLY WELL,

AND OUR PERSONALITIES
WENT REALLY WELL TOGETHER,
AND 17 YEARS LATER--

- LOOK AT THAT.
HOW CUTE.

- OH.
- ADORABLE.
- AND WE LOOK EXACTLY THE SAME.

- WE'RE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME,
EXACTLY, YEAH.

- THAT'S REALLY AMAZING,
TO LOOK AT THAT AND SEE THAT

FROM THAT, THIS IS WHERE
YOU END UP,

TOGETHER 17 YEARS LATER
WINNING A GOLD MEDAL.

- YEAH.
- IT'S INCREDIBLE.

- IT'S CRAZY FOR US TO THINK
TOO, BUT EXCITING.

- AND SO I UNDERSTAND
YOU WENT TO SOME OSCAR PARTIES.

IT'S--THERE'S SOME PERKS
WHEN YOU HAVE GOLD MEDALS, HUH?

- YEAH, YOU KNOW, WE WERE
AT THE VANITY FAIR PARTY,

AND WE HAD HEARD RUMORS
THAT YOU WERE THERE,

BUT WE DIDN'T GET A CHANCE
TO SEE YOU.

- I WAS THERE.
I'M SORRY I MISSED YOU.

- YEAH, WE HAD FUN.
WE HAD A LOT OF FUN.

- YEAH, WE--I MEAN,
THERE WAS SO MANY FAMOUS PEOPLE,
AS YOU KNOW, I MEAN,

JUST ALL OF THE MOST FAMOUS
PEOPLE YOU CAN IMAGINE,

AND SO WE WERE TRYING
TO PLAY IT COOL, YOU KNOW?

WE'RE LIKE,
WE DON'T WANT TO TAKE ANY--

THEN I SAW BILL MURRAY,
AND I WAS LIKE,

"YEAH, I GOT TO TAKE A PICTURE
WITH BILL MURRAY."

SO, YOU KNOW, WE'RE HOLDING
OUR MEDALS AND, YOU KNOW,

TRYING TO, LIKE, FEEL--
MAKE OURSELVES FEEL IMPORTANT,

AND HE'S LIKE, "OH, I FEEL LIKE
I SHOULD BE HOLDING SOMETHING,"

SO HE GRABS MERYL'S CLUTCH,
AND WAS LIKE--
[laughter]

AND IT'S JUST LIKE, OF COURSE,
BILL MURRAY, YOU KNOW?

- YEAH.
- HE'S A GENIUS.
AND IT WAS AWESOME TO MEET HIM.

- THAT'S THE FIRST TIME
I MET HIM TOO, THAT NIGHT.

I HAD NEVER MET HIM BEFORE.
HE'S SUCH A COOL GUY.

- SO FRIENDLY.
- SO DOWN TO EARTH, YEAH.

- WHO ELSE DID YOU
TALK TO THAT NIGHT?

- YOU KNOW, I WAS IN--I WAS
WASHING MY HANDS IN THE BATHROOM

AND I LOOKED UP AND SELENA GOMEZ
WAS STANDING ON MY RIGHT

AND ZOOEY DESCHANEL
WAS STANDING ON MY LEFT,

AND THEY'RE JUST HAVING
A CONVERSATION, AND I WAS LIKE,
"HM, YEAH, THAT'S COOL."
[laughter]

- OH, AND THEN THE--
WE WALK INTO WHERE--

WHERE THEY HAVE THE VANITY FAIR
PHOTO SHOOT GOING ON,

- RIGHT.
- AND WE WANT TO GO IN--

- YEAH, AND SO THE PEOPLE
KIND OF ORGANIZING IT SAID,

"OH, HOLD ON,
HEIDI'S JUST FINISHING UP."
I WENT, "OKAY."

SO THEY SAID, "COME ON IN.
SHE'S FINISHING UP."

AND SO WE WALK IN AND HEIDI KLUM
IS FINISHING UP HER PHOTO SHOOT

AND THEY SAID,
"OKAY, YOU GUYS ARE NEXT,"

AND I'M LIKE, THE ONLY THING
MORE TERRIFYING

THAN THE OLYMPIC GAMES
IS HAVING A PHOTO SHOOT

IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING
HEIDI KLUM.

- YEAH, I COULDN'T EVEN LIKE--
I DIDN'T EVEN WANT TO--

I DIDN'T LOOK AT HER FACE.
I WAS, LIKE, INTIMIDATED.

AND I REGRET THAT NOW.
- YEAH.

- WELL, I'M SURE
YOU'LL SEE EVERYBODY AGAIN.

LET'S TALK ABOUT
"DANCING WITH THE STARS."

SO YOU'RE NOW COMPETITORS.
- YEAH.

- NOW WHO IS GONNA--ARE YOU--
ARE YOU SCARED OF HIM?

ARE YOU SCARED OF HER?
WHO'S GONNA BE THE TOUGHEST?

- I THINK--I THINK WE'RE BOTH
SCARED OF EACH OTHER,

IF YOU WILL, BUT IN A VERY,
YOU KNOW, ENCOURAGING WAY.

I DON'T KNOW HOW ELSE
TO PUT THAT.

I MEAN, WE KNOW EACH OTHER
SO WELL.

WE KNOW HOW HARD
THE OTHER PERSON WORKS.

WE KNOW THAT--YOU KNOW, I KNOW
THAT SHE'S A GREAT DANCER,

AND SHE HAS A GREAT PARTNER
IN MAX, AND, YOU KNOW,

I'M VERY FORTUNATE
TO HAVE SHARNA.

AND WE'RE GONNA HAVE
A LOT OF FUN WITH IT.

IT'S A DIFFERENT EXPERIENCE
THAN THE OLYMPICS.

- BECAUSE, I MEAN, ICE DANCING
IS DIFFERENT THAN DANCING.

I MEAN, IT'S GRACEFUL
AND ATHLETIC AND ALL THAT,
BUT IT'S NOT THE SAME THING.

ARE YOU BOTH DANCERS?
ARE YOU GOOD DANCERS?

- NO.
- NOT REALLY.

- YOU KNOW, WE DIDN'T REALIZE
QUITE HOW DIFFERENT

UNTIL WE STARTED DOING THE LATIN
MOVEMENT ON THE FLOOR.
- YEAH.

- AND WE COULD TELL BY THE LOOK
ON OUR PARTNERS' FACES HOW--
HOW DIFFERENT IT REALLY WAS.

- YEAH, THERE'S GONNA BE
A LOT OF THIS...

- I FEEL LIKE THEY HAD REALLY
HIGH EXPECTATIONS FOR US,

AND THEN WE TOOK A STEP
AND THEY WERE JUST LIKE...

- OH.
- OH, I SEE.
- NOPE!

- BUT, YOU KNOW, SOME OF
THE TECHNIQUE IS DIFFERENT

FOR SKATING TO BALLROOM...
- SURE.

AND WE'RE FINDING WE'RE GONNA
HAVE TO KIND OF

UNLEARN SOME STUFF BEFORE--BUT,
I MEAN, LIKE, WITH PERFORMANCE,

WE FEEL COMFORTABLE, YOU KNOW,
AND SO THAT MAKES A DIFFERENCE.
- THAT PART, YOU HAVE DOWN.

NOW, WILL YOU GO
TO THE 2018 OLYMPICS?

- YOU KNOW,
WE HAVEN'T DECIDED YET.

I THINK, YOU KNOW, CHARLIE AND I
HAVE BEEN SAYING THAT,

FOR 17 YEARS, KIND OF REGARDLESS
OF THE SUCCESSES WE'VE HAD,

WE'VE REALLY KIND OF IMMEDIATELY
MOVED ON TO OUR NEXT GOAL

AND TRIED TO FIGURE OUT
HOW WE COULD GROW

AND HOW WE COULD MOVE
KIND OF UP THE LADDER,
AND SO FOR THE FIRST TIME,

I THINK WE'RE REALLY
ALLOWING OURSELVES

TO JUST BE IN THE MOMENT, AND
WE'LL--WE'LL DECIDE LATER ON.

- ALL RIGHT.
WELL, I HOPE YOU DO.

AND FOR
"DANCING WITH THE STARS,"

I THINK THE HARDEST THING
IS IT'S--

LIKE, IT'S NOTHING FOR YOU
TO BE ON SKATES.

IT'S GONNA BE DIFFICULT
TO BE IN SHOES AND DO THAT,

SO WE HAD SOMETHING MADE FOR YOU
SPECIALLY THAT'LL HELP YOU OUT.
- OH!

THAT'S AMAZING.
- OH, OH, WOW!
- OH, MY GOSH, THANK YOU.
[cheers and applause]

- I DON'T KNOW
IF THAT'S ILLEGAL.

- I THINK I COULD GIVE THESE
A WHIRL.

- IT MIGHT BE ILLEGAL.
I'M NOT SURE.
- THAT'S AWESOME.

- WELL, FIRST OF ALL,
IT'S MY COLOR, SO, YOU KNOW.

- MATCHES YOUR EYES.
- YES.

- YOU'RE WELCOME. ALL RIGHT.
- THANK YOU.

- GOOD LUCK, AND HAVE FUN.
- THAT IS BEAUTIFUL.

- "DANCING WITH THE STARS"
PREMIERS TONIGHT AT 8:00 ON ABC.

I WANT TO THANK HOWIE MANDEL,
BRANDON MCMILLAN,

MERYL DAVIS, CHARLIE WHITE,
AND TWITCH.

HAPPY ST. PATRICK'S DAY,
EVERYBODY.

BE KIND TO ONE ANOTHER.
BYE-BYE.

title: Meryl Davis and Charlie White Talk 'Dancing with the Stars'
